long_description: The SOL Scout survival kit brings together critical survival items and packages them in an ultralight, waterproof dry bag. Kit includes a liquid-filled compass, one Heatsheets survival blanket, a mini Rescue Flash signal mirror and a slim Rescue Howler(TM) whistle. Also includes a survival fishing kit packed in a vial and Tinder-Quick(TM) waterproof fire starter. A roll of 50 in. x 2 in. duct tape has many uses. The SOL Scout survival kit weighs 5.4 oz. and measures 6 x 3.75 x 1 in.
short_description: The SOL Scout survival kit brings together critical survival items and packages them in an ultralight, waterproof dry bag.
